reasonForVisit.text: Patient presents with acute jaundice and severe itching affecting quality of life and sleep

clinicalImpression.text: Acute Liver Injury / Severe Hepatitis of Unknown Etiology

presentingSymptoms.text: Jaundice (yellowing of eyes and skin) - onset 2 days prior

keyFindings.text: Significant Transaminitis (ALT 620 U/L, AST 450 U/L - >10x normal)

3_weeks_ago.text: Dental abscess treated with Amoxicillin-Clavulanate (Augmentin) 875mg BID for 10 days

1_week_ago.text: Completed antibiotic course, continued Tylenol PM/Extra Strength for jaw pain

2_days_ago.text: Onset of jaundice and severe itching

referral_date.text: 2025-11-20 - Referred by Dr. Jenkins from Midtown Primary Care
